findings.title: Unprotected approve function
findings.description: The approve function allows unlimited approval to the spender without any validation or access control, potentially leading to unauthorized token transfers.

findings.title: Unprotected transfer function
findings.description: The transfer function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential loss of assets.

findings.title: Unprotected transferFrom function
findings.description: The transferFrom function allows a spender to withdraw a set number of tokens from a specified account without proper protection.

findings.title: Unprotected burn function
findings.description: The burn function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential loss of assets.

findings.title: Unprotected swap function
findings.description: The swap function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential manipulation of the contract's state.

findings.title: Unprotected skim function
findings.description: The skim function is unprotected, which can lead to unauthorized access and potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected sync function
findings.description: The withdraw() function in the contract does not have proper synchronization protection, which can lead to unexpected behavior and potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected initialize function
findings.description: The initialize function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential manipulation of contract state.

findings.title: Unprotected increaseAllowance function
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function is unprotected and can lead to unauthorized allowance increases.

findings.title: Unprotected decreaseAllowance function
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function does not have proper access control or validation, allowing unauthorized users to decrease allowance.

findings.title: Unprotected _approve function
findings.description: The _approve function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected _transfer function
findings.description: The _transfer function is unprotected and can be exploited by attackers.

findings.title: Unprotected swapAndLiquify function
findings.description: The swapAndLiquify function lacks protection, potentially allowing unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: Unprotected swapTokensForEth function
findings.description: The swapTokensForEth function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected addLiquidity function
findings.description: The addLiquidity function does not have any protection mechanism, which can lead to unauthorized access and potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected _tokenTransfer function
findings.description: The _tokenTransfer function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected countUpFeeShare function
findings.description: The countUpFeeShare function is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected _transferBothExcluded function
findings.description: The _transferBothExcluded function lacks protection, which may lead to unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: Unprotected _getValues function
findings.description: The _getValues function lacks protection, potentially leading to unauthorized access or data manipulation.

findings.title: Unprotected _getTValues function
findings.description: The _getTValues function lacks protection and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected _takeLiquidity function
findings.description: The _takeLiquidity function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected calculateLiquidityFee function
findings.description: The calculateLiquidityFee function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected removeAllFee function
findings.description: The removeAllFee function is unprotected and can be accessed by anyone, potentially leading to unintended fee removal.

findings.title: Unprotected restoreAllFee function
findings.description: The restoreAllFee function is unprotected and can be accessed by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected excludeFromFee function
findings.description: The excludeFromFee function does not have any access control modifier, making it accessible to anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected includeInFee function
findings.description: The includeInFee function is declared as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.
